title: The 25 Best Stocking Stuffer Gifts Under $25
summary:

In fact, there are plenty of delightful gifts for under $25 that could fit in the palm of your hand and most certainly fit snugly inside a Christmas stocking this holiday season.

Or, for those who have run out of Netflix shows to binge, you can give the gift of home entertainment.
Here, find 25 stocking stuffers for $25 or less that are small but mighty stylish.
paragraphs: Whether you’re looking for a small holiday gift that makes a big impact or shopping on a budget, there are plenty of covetable items that are tiny and won’t break the bank. In fact, there are plenty of delightful gifts for under $25 that could fit in the palm of your hand and most certainly fit snugly inside a Christmas stocking this holiday season. Take, for instance, John Derian’s well-designed, mini-but-mighty matchboxes at just $4 a pop, or Christopher Kane’s “More Joy” logo socks.

And speaking of more joy, after the hellish year that has been 2020, we could also all benefit from the gift of a little at-home pampering, especially if it involves a beauty or wellness regimen that doesn’t cost as much as a monthly rent check. Consider a DIY manicure with a polish by J.Hannah, a sheet mask from Tatcha, or a scalp massager from the newly launched hair-care line Ceremonia. Or, for those who have run out of Netflix shows to binge, you can give the gift of home entertainment. If you’re on the hunt for a stocking stuffer that befits a game-night enthusiast, why not give them a set of display-worthy dice or a 1,000-piece jigsaw puzzle inspired by Vogue’s very own archive?

In addition, there are also plenty of petite presents that are good enough to eat, a la Di Martino’s Dolce & Gabbana spaghetti or Kerber’s Farm classic buttermilk pancake mix. And don’t forget the slew of little treasures guaranteed to make anyone smile while unwrapping too, like a seashell-shaped trinket jewelry case or a vibrantly printed box of colored pencils.
Here, find 25 stocking stuffers for $25 or less that are small but mighty stylish.
